Plot: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.
Title: Employee of the Month
Writer: Don Calame (screenplay), Chris Conroy (screenplay), Greg Coolidge (screenplay), Don Calame (story), Chris Conroy (story)
Actors: Dane Cook, Jessica Simpson, Dax Shepard, Andy Dick
tomatoConsensus: Employee of the Month features mediocre performances, few laughs, and a lack of satiric bite.
